pr_title: IGNITE-12552: Move ReadOnlyMetricRegistry to public API.

timeline.bodyText: Since exporter is supposed to be implemented by a user, we need to move HistogramMetric and supporting logic to public package as well. An exporter must be implemented using public API solely.
timeline.author: agoncharuk

Please, take a look, one more time.
